articles.description: 吴说获悉，Celsius 获准可以从 2023 年 7 月 1 日或之后开始，将任何非 BTC 和非 ETH 加密货币出售或转换为 BTC 或 ETH。Celsius 持有价值 7050 万美元的 CEL、5180 万美元的 MATIC、2620 万美元的 ADA、1730 万美元的 LINK、1440 万美元的 LTC 等。https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/06/30/bankrupt-celsius-can-convert-altcoins-to-btc-eth-starting-july-1-following-sec-talks/

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，彭博社 ETF 分析师 Eric Balchunas 表示，SEC 希望他们透露预计与他们签订“监控共享协议”的现货比特币交易所的名称，以及提供有关这些监控安排细节的足够信息，“这是可以理解的，可以说是个好消息”。芝加哥期权交易所发言人表示，计划更新并重新提交文件。https://twitter.com/EricBalchunas/status/1674777296438165505

Eric Balchunas: Hold up a second, this isn't as bad as headline. The key paragraph is deep in story. Basically SEC wants them to name the "crypto exchange" and give more details on SSA. That's understandable, arguably good news. I was under impression they'd have to update that as well. https://t.co/bh9qn65Xh2

articles.description: 据彭博社，花旗集团正在审查其与瑞士加密托管机构 Metaco 的数字资产托管合作伙伴关系，并已开始与其他提供商进行非正式谈判。花旗于去年 6 月选择 Metaco 作为其托管合作伙伴以扩展到代币化证券和其他区块链相关产品。Metaco 于今年 5 月被 Ripple 以 2.5 亿美元收购。 https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-06-30/citigroup-reviews-partnership-with-metaco-which-was-bought-by-ripple?utm_source=website&utm_medium=share&utm_campaign=twitter&leadSource=uverify%20wall https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674764818006552576

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: ENS 计划扩展到 Layer2 生态系统，实现与ENS域名的L2互操作性。团队称这是未来的重要升级，旨在使域名注册和交易对更广泛的用户群体更加便捷。其计划利用离链解析器，借助ENS离链注册合约和各服务提供商（包括http://cb.id、Lens Protocol以及OptiNames等）来实现。

articles.description: Re 可升级性允许合约支持添加新功能以适应未来以太坊用户的需求和功能；可移植性使用户可以在不需要转移资产或更改地址的情况下在钱包提供商之间切换；社交恢复机制使用户在密钥丢失或被黑客攻击的情况下，通过预定义的守护者重新获得对他们钱包的访问权限。https://hackmd.io/@soulwallet/contract
articles.title: Re 可升级性允许合约支持添加新功能以适应未来以太坊用户的需求和功能；可移植性使用户可以在不需要转移资产或更改地址的情况下在钱包提供商之间切换；社交恢复...

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，智能合约钱包 Soul Wallet 宣布引入了模块和插件，同时保持核心合约不变；模块是一种白名单合约，能够代表智能合约钱包执行交易；插件（也称为钩子）可以配置在执行交易之前进行额外的检查；为了支持永久所有权，智能合约需要支持可升级性、可移植性和社交恢复；

articles.description: 据币安 2023 年 3 月至 5 月对其 208 名机构客户进行的一项调查，63.5％的受访者对明年的加密货币前景持乐观态度，88％对未来十年持乐观态度。47% 的机构投资者在过去一年中保留了加密货币配置，超过三分之一在同一时期增加了配置。投资者认为基础设施是最重要的，其次是Layer1、Layer2。（CoinDesk）

Adam@Greeks.live: 季度交割已经完成，近几日BTC大宗看涨的成交较多，主要以季度末平仓和移仓为主，ETH的移仓主要在盘口进行。
季度交割完成后，市场近几个月来积压的仓位得到释放，如果七月份行情支持的话，期权可能会迎来较大的变盘。… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674693214224400384 https://t.co/5clwdaX5e3

测试网阶段才是最可怕的，不刷，你就拉开差距了
宣布融资时个分水岭，不刷，它就快照了
主网上线才是最可怕的，不刷，差距就拉开了
忠诚度计划不好好做，基本就跟空投无缘了
奥德赛活动一定要落实，不然要吃大亏
项目发币了也不能松懈，准备好二次空投
🥲

炒币是会亏钱的，交互撸毛也会 
除了打工和做镰刀割韭菜没什么是永赚的 
不是不亏，迟早会亏 
不是不报，迟早要报 
留点钱好好地活下去比什么都重要 
不是 
好好做面包，面包都会有的 
而是 
好好做面包，面包才会有的  
悲观者正确，乐观者赚钱 
但剩者为王 https://t.co/YYp2wq5DHU

articles.author: 8848 社区（8848 Community）
articles.description:
RT Emperor Osmo🧪

articles.author: 链求君 | (C,C)
articles.description:
据说今天俄罗斯内乱。 
苏联解体后的1991年到1994年在原苏联加盟国间形成的一个短时期货币同盟。卢布区的国家使用同一种货币，先是苏联卢布，然后是俄罗斯卢布。随着各国陆续放弃使用卢布，转而发行本国的货币，这一货币联盟也随之崩溃。
俄罗斯平民可能集体梭哈比特币！

加美财经caus.com: 俄罗斯军方和安全部门指责瓦格纳雇佣兵老板普里戈津试图发动政变
#乌克兰战争 #俄罗斯 俄罗斯将军们周五晚些时候指控瓦格纳雇佣兵老板叶夫根尼·普里戈津试图对普京发
http://m.caus.com/detail/77186 https://t.co/LwyT0tJKPL

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice 
https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw

John W. Ratcliff: There is a strange point with the wording in that BlackRock ETF about hard forks.
Traditionally, when a hard fork occurs, users get tokens on *both* forks. Large exchanges have generally honored this for custodial tokens.
However, that's not what the BlackRock ETF says. It says… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1669937251286126592

articles.description:
RT Justin Slaughter
So, I respectfully disagree with Noelle on this one. I think BlackRock is doing this on the merits (seeking to get a bitcoin ETF approved) rather than trying to send a political message. 
Bear with me, because this is complicated in terms of Democratic politics. https://twitter.com/NoelleInMadrid/status/1669624250804600832

Noelle Acheson: My take on the BlackRock BTC ETF filing:
- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/06/15/blackrocks-ishares-files-paperwork-for-spot-bitcoin-etf/

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
It’s nice the lagging data points starting to catch up with real time data showing the Fed is increasingly out of touch saying it’s going to keep hiking multiple times from here.

The Kobeissi Letter: BREAKING: PCE inflation, the Fed’s preferred inflation metric, FALLS to 3.8%, below expectations of 4.6%.
Core PCE inflation is now at 4.6%, also below expectations of 4.7%.
This is the largest monthly drop this year.
The Fed may finally be winning the fight against inflation. https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674757717582290948
articles.title: It’s nice the lagging data points starting to catch up with real time data showing the Fed is increasingly out of touch saying it’s going to keep hi...

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Interesting…

Adam Cochran (adamscochran.eth): 1/7
Most important change in the Coinbase vs SEC case:
CB is arguing "major questions doctrine"
This is a statutory interpretation (legal theory essentially) that says only Congress has the right to decide "major questions" https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674403960361197569
articles.title: Interesting…

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
RFK is so overrated. He’s just a standard lib

Robert F. Kennedy Jr: Regarding the Supreme Court banning affirmative action in higher ed — I know many Americans feel that purely race-based decisions are unfair. However, this feeling misses important context. The effects of racist policies going back centuries are now self-perpetuating.
articles.title: RFK is so overrated. He’s just a standard lib
